name: RoboJogger
description:
A Rickety Robot Runner!

This old robot wants to maintain its fitness by going for a jog. It plans to really push itself today. Unfortunately, its screws are coming loose and its brain circuits will fall off if it keeps up the pace! Try to keep its head together for as long as you can!

Originally made for the BtG - Winter Jam 2021

The theme of the jam was "Memory Leak". In this game, that theme is represented by the robot's circuits (which probably contain its memories) coming loose.

Credits
  • Design, Art: David Dam (https://geezerwizard.itch.io/)
  • Programming, Beeps and Boops (Sound), Jank Meister: Kiran Bommakanti (https://narik.itch.io/)
